name: Mumei's Silly Valentine
description:
⚠  If you run into any problems with the web version (runs slow, etc), downloading is recommended. ⚠

#MoomerValentine.  A short holoCouncilRyS fan visual novel!

Details 

Content Length:  Around an hour (depends on reading speed).

Endings: Single Ending. Only  scene order and variations are affected by choices.

Voice: No voice apart from a few voice snippets from their streams.

Synopsis 

It's Valentine's!

Mumei opens her bag and reaches for her homemade chocolate, but her hand stops just as she was about to pull it out. 

"... Who was it for again?"

Oh my gosh. Mumei, that's such a silly oopsie! 

No worries though. Everything will be fine. 

Her brain may forget, but surely, her heart will remember.

 

Credits 

Direction / Scenario / Programming / Art: @planetdropper

Music used: DOVA-Syndrome, Nanashi Mumei, Irys, Camellia, Arkhand, Hoshimachi Suisei

Editing+brainstorming help: M42
Oshi marks: Twemoji 
and Mumei's member stickers

All the hololive talents for existing and inspiring :D

Any lore or factual inconsistencies with the hololive talents may have been made in service of the story or because of the dumb creator's lack of knowledge.
